entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF FREEZING DRIZZLE WITH PATCHY DRIZZLE LATE THIS EVENING
PATCHY FOG LATE THIS EVENING
NEW ICE ACCUMULATION AROUND A TRACE
LOWS AROUND 20
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS AROUND 30
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 17
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING EAST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 40
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY
RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

RAIN
HIGHS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

CLOUDY
RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 80 PERCENT

CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW
LOWS 15 TO 20

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT
